description: Savory black beans and garlic roasted sweet potatoes are dressed in lime juice and fresh cilantro and served with spicy raspberry chipotle sauce in these sweet & savory vegan sweet potato burrito bowls.
name: Black Bean Sweet Potato Burrito Bowls with Raspberry Chipotle Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 medium sweet potato (cut into 1 inch cubes)
1 cup cooked or canned black beans (drained and rinsed)
1-2 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce (finely chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400Â°. Toss sweet potato, onion, garlic, olive oil, cumin, salt and pepper together in roasting pan or oven-safe skillet. Bake until sweet potatoes are tender and lightly browned, about 30-35 minutes, flipping once or twice during baking.
Remove from oven and add beans, cilantro and lime juice. Flip a few times to distrbute. Season with additional salt and pepper if needed.
